gov.nih.nlm.ling.graph

Class SentenceGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapht.graph.AbstractGraph<V,E>
      • org.jgrapht.graph.AbstractBaseGraph<V,E>
        • org.jgrapht.graph.SimpleDirectedGraph<V,E>
          • org.jgrapht.experimental.dag.DirectedAcyclicGraph<Node,Edge>
            • gov.nih.nlm.ling.graph.SentenceGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.jgrapht.DirectedGraph<Node,Edge>, org.jgrapht.Graph<Node,Edge>

    public class SentenceGraph
extends org.jgrapht.experimental.dag.DirectedAcyclicGraph<Node,Edge>
    Represents a sentence-bound portion of a DocumentGraph. It is generated from the textual units of a sentence and its dependencies.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
